about_the_game:
1925, the Greater Zmeyan Empire has been swallowing nations left and right. In a futile defensive stand you, a military captain, have been swallowed too. The enslaved, the drifters and the dregs will become the makeup of your future squad, united under the goal of freedom. As fugitives trapped within a hostile empire, you and your squad must find escape or suffer death. Steel yourself for the upcoming war of survival.

Features :

  • Have you ever dreamed of commanding your own troop of charming girls(and guys)? This is your chance!
  • A fusion of real-time and turn based combat allows you to assess the battlefield, give orders and execute rapid action.
  • Command a squad of misfits through intense battles as they combat their own inner turmoil.
  • Choose from various WW1 and interwar era weapons, tanks and equipment to customize over 10 unique characters.
  • Two playable game modes available from launch: story campaign and sandbox modes
  • And more to come!

name: Unconventional Warfare Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista/Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo @ 2.0GHz (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 240 (or equivalent)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: In this top-down tactical shooter RPG, guide a band of cute soldiers through a warzone to safety. Rescue, train and manage your squad for the upcoming war of survival.
